panels.description:
For each device, the number of EBGP peers configured.   
The devices are hardcoded in the queries.
panels.title: EBGP peers configured

panels.description:
For each device, the number of  BGP sessions state established.   
The devices are hardcoded in the queries.
panels.title: BGP sessions state established

panels.description:
The number of transitions to the BGP session state established .    
Hardcoded for device 100.123.1.0 only  
The  neighbors are hardcoded in the queries
panels.title: Transitions to the BGP session state established on device 100.123.1.0
